content: प्रभृतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Beginning, commencement; generally used in this sense as the last member of <ab>Bah.</ab> compounds; इंद्रप्रभृतयो देवाः &c. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> An oblation. {@--3@} Throwing or casting (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} From, ever since, beginning with (with <ab>abl.</ab>); शैशवात्प्रभृति पोषितां प्रियां <ls>U. 1. 45</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 26</ls> <ls>R. 2. 38</ls>; अद्य प्रभृति henceforward; ततः प्रभृति, अतः प्रभृति &c.
